text: Iwo anasandutsa Abusa ndi atsogoleri awo a mpingo kukhala Ambuye mowonjezera pa Mulungu ndi Messiya, mwana wa Maria, ngati Mulungu pamene iwo adalamulidwa kuti asapembedze wina aliyense koma Mulungu mmodzi yekha basi. Kulibe mulungu wina koma Iye yekha. Kuyamikidwa ndi kulemekezedwa kukhale kwa Iye kuposa zonse zimene adazikhazikitsa mowonjezera pa Iye
